talk.author: did:plc:ykzrocuwquiqiedwczwbhjcn
talk.utter: I’ll post this again. Since there is no non-religious justification for banning abortion in America, can anyone explain to me why the issue of abortion is not argued as a violation of all of our religious freedom?

talk.author: did:plc:svbcgtpq5cnldy5rmmvflsui
talk.utter: Killing babies is wrong.  Change my mind.

talk.author: did:plc:ykzrocuwquiqiedwczwbhjcn
talk.utter: The only people who are opposed to abortion are those who are not affected by it directly. To call a fetus a full human being is inaccurate, perhaps not within your religious framework, but that’s why our Constitution guarantees religious freedom.
